127 enum class AnimPlayStatusFlag {
128  kFadingOut = 1 << 0,
129  kFadingIn = 1 << 1
130 };
131 
132 struct TransitionPlayData {
133  float m_totalTime;
134  float m_fadeInTime;
135  float m_fadeOutTime;
136 };

139 struct AnimationPlayData {
140  AnimationPlayData(const std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle>& animHandle, const AnimationSettings& settings,
141  const AnimationPlaybackMode& mode, const Timer& timer, uint32_t statusFlags);
142  ~AnimationPlayData();
143 
144  bool isFadingIn() const {
145  return m_statusFlags & (uint32_t)AnimPlayStatusFlag::kFadingIn;
146  }
147 
148  bool isFadingOut() const {
149  return m_statusFlags & (uint32_t)AnimPlayStatusFlag::kFadingOut;
150  }
151 
152  std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle> m_animationHandle;
153  AnimationSettings m_settings;
154  AnimationPlaybackMode m_playbackMode;
155 
157  //Motion* m_motion = nullptr;
158 
159  TransitionPlayData m_transitionData;
160 
162  Timer m_timer;
163 
165  Timer m_transitionTimer;
166 
168  uint32_t m_statusFlags = 0;
169 };

176 class NodeAnimation {
177 public:
178  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
181 
182  NodeAnimation();
183  ~NodeAnimation();
184 
186 
187  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
190 
191  inline std::vector<Vector3>& translations() { return m_translations; }
192  inline const std::vector<Vector3>& translations() const { return m_translations; }
193 
194  inline std::vector<Quaternion>& rotations() { return m_rotations; }
195  inline const std::vector<Quaternion>& rotations() const { return m_rotations; }
196 
197  inline std::vector<Vector3>& scales() { return m_scales; }
198  inline const std::vector<Vector3>& scales() const { return m_scales; }
199 
201 
202  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
206 
207  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
210 
211  inline size_t size() const { return m_translations.size(); }
212 
214  void interpolate(uint32_t first, uint32_t second, float weight, AnimationFrameData& out) const;
215 
217 
218 private:
219 
220  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
